ygData.subject: Re: Has the Lugubrious Lament Been Nerfed??
ygData.msgSnippet: ... true of course, but i love having a full set.  had full bronze, full steel, and now full rubi, which i just love the look of.  i just hate those red
ygData.messageBody:
> Color choice, like everything else, is highly subjective. Personally I
> would have liked a black plate chest to go with my Rubi pants, then I
> could have passed my chest on to our Rogue, who hasn't had the good
> fortune to find one and can't wear plate at all. Our cleric is in a
> mixture of Black and Red and it looks just great.

true of course, but i love having a full set. had full bronze, full steel,
and now full rubi, which i just love the look of. i just hate those red
popsicle wisecracks =P

Shada
